description: Function definitions for the HR Sub-Agent connected to BambooHR

functions.name: list_employees
functions.description: Retrieve the full employee directory from BambooHR. Returns names, titles, departments, emails, and employment status.

returns.description: Array of all active employees with basic profile info

functions.name: get_employee
functions.description: Look up a single employee by their BambooHR ID. Returns detailed profile information including job title, department, hire date, supervisor, and contact info.

functions.name: add_employee
functions.description: Create a new employee record in BambooHR. Used during onboarding to set up a new hire with basic profile information.

returns.description: The created employee record with assigned ID

functions.name: update_employee
functions.description: Update specific fields on an existing employee record. Can update title, department, location, phone, and other profile fields.

employee_id.description: The BambooHR employee ID to update

fields.description: Key-value pairs of field names and new values to set

functions.name: get_time_off
functions.description: Retrieve time-off requests within a date range. Includes approved, pending, and denied requests. Useful for capacity planning and absence tracking.

returns.description: Array of time-off requests in the specified range

functions.name: list_job_openings
functions.description: Retrieve all active job openings from the BambooHR Applicant Tracking System (ATS). Shows job title, department, location, and hiring lead.

functions.name: get_applicants
functions.description: Retrieve all applicants for a specific job opening. Shows applicant names, emails, ratings, sources, and current pipeline status.

returns.description: Array of applicants for the specified job

functions.name: change_applicant_status
functions.description: Move an applicant to a different stage in the hiring pipeline (e.g., New → Phone Screen → Interview → Offer). Offer stage and beyond requires human approval.

status_id.description: The target status/stage ID to move the applicant to

functions.name: get_goals
functions.description: Retrieve performance goals for a specific employee. Shows goal titles, descriptions, completion percentage, milestones, and due dates.

returns.description: Array of performance goals for the employee

functions.name: get_training
functions.description: Retrieve training records for a specific employee. Shows completed and in-progress training courses, hours, credits, and certifications.

returns.description: Array of training records for the employee
